component_summary.name: Select
component_summary.description: Styled wrappers around @radix-ui/react-select primitives providing consistent project styling, icon indicators and scroll buttons. Exposes common select building blocks used across forms and dialogs.

components: SelectContent (portal wrapper with viewport and scroll buttons)
notes: Presentation layer only; delegates accessibility and behavior to Radix primitives.
Duplication risk is low; styling logic is shared via cn utility.
